analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave yvā ayam jhāyī samādhismim sātacca kārī ca hoti samādhismim sappāya kārī ca ayam imesam catunnam jhāyīnam aggaḥ ca seṭṭhaḥ ca mokkho ca uttamaḥ ca pavaro ca ati

original: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
analyzed: attamanāḥ te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandunti
yathā pañcapaññāsam veyyākaraṇāni honti tathā vitthāretabbāni
